Name: Wizardry Squared
About the game: Wizardry Squared is a physics-based spell-crafting action RPG. You are young square wizard, exploring increasingly more difficult procedurally generated levels, enemies, dungeons, and bosses to exact revenge against the ones who have wronged you. Along the way you will enhance your attributes, equip magical items, and acquire and create new spells to find treasures, solve puzzles, and delve deep into dungeons. These efforts will surely help you in the final level. Video Review Watch StellarDakota Wizardry Squared Video Series Review! Video Spell-crafting Watch PixelandChill Spell-craft her way through Dungeons, Puzzles, & Enemies! Key Features Unique Spell-Crafting Interface Upgradable stats, purchasable spells, and fast-travel Procedural Dungeons full of puzzles, enemies, bosses, and new magical gear! New Loots system enhances abilities to push into challenging worlds unknown Casual Platforming Shooter Spell-crafting; Make the spells you need Quick-spells: Store the spells you use often Physics-based Problems to Solve for Loot More than 1000 levels...probably a lot more Different enemy types and procedurally built mini-bosses Drop-In/Out Couch-Coop Controller(s) or Keyboard/Mouse A helpful pet companion It may be finished, but, there is always room for more. Its just me so let me know your ideas and if there is enough interest I will make it happen. /dev
